riddles.riddle: I am a three-digit number. My tens digit is five more than my ones digit, and my hundreds digit is eight less than my tens digit. What number am I?
What number do you get when you multiply all of the numbers on a telephone's number pad?
What number becomes zero when you subtract 15 from half of it?
If I subtract 10 from a number and then double the result, I get 60. What is the number?
What number, when doubled and then reduced by 10, equals 20?
What number, when 8 is added to it, equals three times itself?
If you subtract 4 from a number and then multiply the result by 5, you get 40. What is the number?
I am a two-digit number. My tens digit is three times my ones digit, and the sum of my digits is 12. What number am I?
What number, when multiplied by 2 and then reduced by 5, equals 15?
What number, when 8 is added to it, equals its double?
I am a three-digit number. My tens digit is 1 greater than my hundreds digit, and my ones digit is 2 less than my tens digit. The sum of my digits is 12. What number am I?
What number, when divided by 4, gives the same result as when 6 is subtracted from it?
What number, when squared, equals 121?
What number, when added to its double, equals 18?
What number becomes 30 when you add 20 to half of it?
What number, when decreased by 4 and then multiplied by 3, gives 30?
I am a two-digit number. The difference between my digits is 3, and the sum of my digits is 9. What number am I?
I am a two-digit number. My ones digit is half my tens digit, and the sum of my digits is 12. What number am I?
What number, when you subtract 9 from it, equals 9?
What number is the sum of the first four prime numbers?
What number do you get when you multiply the digits of 123?
What is the result when you add the first five positive even numbers?
What positive number becomes 0 when you subtract it from its square?
What number do you get when you add the digits of 12345?
I am a three-digit number. My hundreds digit is 2, my tens digit is 3, and my ones digit is the sum of my hundreds and tens digits. What number am I?
What number, when tripled and then reduced by 7, equals 26?
What is the smallest two-digit prime number?
What is the difference between the squares of 6 and 4?
If you reverse the digits of the number 21, what number do you get?
What number results when you add the first three odd numbers?
